body_html:
Happy to work with you on this. TensorFlow probably needs to:

  • Define a workspace name (workspace(name = "org_tensorflow") in the WORKSPACE file).
  • Fix any scripts you have that reference runfiles to look for them under x.runfiles/org_tensorflow (or whatever you choose for a name), instead of x.runfiles.

I'll take a look and see if I can reproduce/fix it myself.

body:
Happy to work with you on this.  TensorFlow probably needs to:
- Define a workspace name (`workspace(name = "org_tensorflow")` in the WORKSPACE file).
- Fix any scripts you have that reference runfiles to look for them under `x.runfiles/org_tensorflow` (or whatever you choose for a name), instead of `x.runfiles`. 

I'll take a look and see if I can reproduce/fix it myself.
